About Me

I'm Monish, a passionate B.E. Computer Science and Engineering student specializing in Cybersecurity at Arunai Engineering College, Tiruvannamalai (2023-2027). My journey in technology is driven by a deep fascination with digital security and web development.

As a cybersecurity enthusiast, I'm dedicated to understanding the intricacies of digital threats and developing robust solutions to protect against them. My expertise spans across web development technologies and cybersecurity tools, allowing me to build secure, functional digital experiences.

I'm actively seeking opportunities to apply my skills in real-world scenarios and contribute to innovative projects in cybersecurity and web development. My goal is to bridge the gap between creative web development and robust security practices.
